content.question: Based on the positions of elements in the periodic table, which of the following groups contains compounds that are most likely to have similar chemical properties?

choices.label: <math alttext="K C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>KCl</mi></math>, <math alttext="K B r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>KBr</mi></math>, and <math alttext="K l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>KI</mi></math>

<math alttext="A s C l 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>AsCl</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="S C l 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>SCl</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="C I F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>ClF</mi></math>

<math alttext="C F 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>CF</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="P F 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>PF</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="S e F 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>SeF</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="N H 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>NH</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="H 2 O" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math>, and <math alttext="H F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>HF</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="K C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>KCl</mi></math>, <math alttext="K B r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>KBr</mi></math>, and <math alttext="K l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>KI</mi></math>

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
